review: Doctor missed out my mentioning that my child has fever along with cough and cold and prescribed medicines with no paracetamol. Visted him again after 1 day and upon asking about the fever medicine which he skipped to prescribe, he ignored. Cash is the only mode of payment. No receipt is provided. Even after visiting in a gap of 1 day he charged full visiting fees of 600/- ****** *** ******** ******* ***** *** * **** ***** **** ** *** **********

**** ****** ** ***** ******* **** **** ********** ** ***** ***** *** *** ********. You visit him after a day, he will ask for fees again for the same problem. I have paid 5 times Rs. 700 for the sane problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
